tool_description: Forecasts HVAC load demand based on historical patterns, weather predictions, occupancy schedules, and seasonal trends to optimize system operation and energy planning.

historical_loads.description: Historical load data in kW for pattern analysis

occupancy_schedule.description: Expected occupancy levels (0-100%) for forecast period

error_messages: Insufficient historical data: Minimum 168 hours (1 week) of historical load data required.
Weather forecast mismatch: weather_forecast length must be at least equal to forecast_hours.
Forecast hours out of range: Value must be between 1 and 168 hours.
Invalid seasonal factor: Value must be between 0.5 and 2.0.
Invalid temperature data: Weather forecast temperatures must be between -50 and 130 Fahrenheit.
usage: Provide historical_loads and weather_forecast arrays. Optionally include occupancy_schedule, forecast_hours, and seasonal_factor. Returns load demand predictions with confidence intervals.

forecasted_loads.description: Predicted load values in kW for each forecast hour

confidence_intervals.description: Confidence interval range for each prediction

peak_demand.description: Predicted peak demand in kW during forecast period

peak_time.description: Predicted time of peak demand in ISO 8601 format

forecast_accuracy.description: Expected forecast accuracy based on historical performance (0-100)

demand_pattern.description: Identified demand pattern: steady, variable, peak_morning, peak_afternoon
